name: mediumdesk
description: Minimal Desktop App for Medium developed by Medium enthusiasts

scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:linux && npm run build:windows
scripts.build:osx: electron-packager . --overwrite --asar --out=dist --ignore='^media$' --prune --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=static/Icon.icns --app-bundle-id=com.sivragav.mediumdesk --sign='Developer ID Application: Sivaprakash Ragavan (7S2WW76HXL)' --app-version=$npm_package_version && cd dist/MediumDesk-darwin-x64 && codesign --deep --force --verbose --sign 'Developer ID Application: Sivaprakash Ragavan (7S2WW76HXL)' MediumDesk.app && zip -ryXq9 ../MediumDesk-osx-${npm_package_version}.zip MediumDesk.app
